hymn.title: Oh, the depth of the riches

layout.singingstanza: Oh, the depth of the rich -- es And the wis -- dom and know -- ledge of God; How un -- search -- a -- ble are His judg -- ments; How un -- trace -- a -- ble are His paths. For who has known the mind of the Lord, Or who has been His coun -- sel -- or? Or who has first giv -- en to Him, And it will be re -- paid to Him? Be -- cause out of Him and through Him And to Him are all things. To Him be the glo -- ry for -- ev -- er. A -- men.

lyrics.stanza: Oh, the depth of the riches And the wisdom and knowledge of God; How unsearchable are His judgments; How untraceable are His paths. For who has known the mind of the Lord, Or who has been His counselor? Or who has first given to Him, And it will be repaid to Him? Because out of Him and through Him And to Him are all things. To Him be the glory forever. Amen.
